content: First impressions pretty amazing. After playing for longer n lil fixes made to visuals etc, the game is only missing gameplay improvements. Encounters would be better if you didn't have to be fast travelling on the world map. Torp firing could do with a lil calculation to hit a ship, other sims have this, objectives would be great, recon a convoy undetected for Xhrs, deliver supplies or Spies undetected, radio alerts etc, air patrols hunting you would be good too. Great game though
I don't like the control of the game, and it is hard to see all the guages and determine your depth.
Very good sub game,best on the droid,hope for more updates,don't let this die,regards✌️

Ok they had a tec problem, it's fixed now , this is a play store classic , and yes sometimes it took 3 torpedoes to take a ship out people , it's set in ww2, pacific theatre , which was 1940s, this game is frigin awesome. And I've played them all,,
When r the updates coming if you paired with crash dive you would be richer,

Paid for this game years ago. Used to be fun, but after the last update, it don't work for do-do! Targeting is 180°out with both the scope and tbt. Uninstalled and reloaded. Still junk! Too bad. Used to be a fun game you could play for hours. Can't even get to their website! Down for maintenance! And the only instructions are in German! Wasted money.
make a exact copy of silent Hunter 4 mobile version and keyboard version please? well, if you get permission
Verygood
Great game. Can you add a post WWII mode for the game.
It doesnt work this game has a massive bug unplayable
Loaded ok but once mission completed just locked in the middle of the sea and would not return to base. Uninstalled and reinstalled... no difference. Paid £6.50 for this and it doesn't work !

I expected more from a game that cost money. It would freeze up after being killed. Ships on the map in front of me were showing 180 degree difference in the game at times or yhe would not show on the map at all, suddenly a destroyer is sinking me. I would have liked a training that showd how to fire torpedos. I uninstalled the game. Graphics were ok. Silent service the PC game and this game only thing they have in common is war patrol other than that did not work as easy a silent service
Awesome

I advise you save your money, this game is totally unplayable. Where ships are on the map bears absolutely no relation to where they are when surfaced and I could not see an oil tanker less than 50 yards directly in front of me even through binoculars. This app looks like it may well have been designed by a school pupil for their 1st programming project.
Will not Open, got Refund...
Love this game
I want my money back bad game
i can't play it just freezes
Best submarine simulator ever. and i was wondering if the devs were planning to add a hydro phone? As that would make it best game ever

The graphics and overall presentation is progressing nicely. The gameplay is stellar and the addition of the 3d control room was a nice touch. Crash Dive was my goto for subsims but this has to be the new Gold Standard for submariners on Android. I'll be recommending to friends and family.
program written by people who hate americans. its designed to fail.
Very buggy freezes much of the time.
its the submarine game ive always dreamed of & only mobile game ive spent money on.
Brillant and fantastic
good game
lame

Game has even more flaws than originally encountered. Can't target ships while on the surface unless you are looking DIRECTLY at it for a stupid amount of time. hard to do while turning or god forbid rough seas. Once a ship is on to you, you have very very little chance of actually destroying it. Gets repetitive quickly.

torpedo damage is really unrealistic. destroyers shouldn't need up to 3 torps to sink, recover from a torpedo hit like nothing happened. cruisers im judging heavily for historical accuracy because i doubt they carried depth charges and can track a submarine under water without the use of active sonar. in all i wish torpedo damage was more advanced, so you wouldnt need to spam 3 precious weapons to sink ships all the time, so if a single torpedo hits a ship, that ship better start flooding/sink.
its a great game graphics are great gameplay is okay i love the open world it would be great if we were able to improve our submarine to make it stronger faster more fire power

Played the game and like it! But! I encountered a ship which didn't show up on the charts, and after three solid torpedo hits proceeded to lay upon it's side and take all my gun shell hits, and not sink. I then came up close to put another torpedo in it, and all torpedos ran to one side, then the other and was unable to sink it. Then this ship not making any speed (0 knts) and my sub at 0 knots, had a collision and I received major damage. like the game, but it needs major work to correct flaws.
Good game needs some more updates

I can't save a mission. Navigation is all messed up, map view indicated enemy ship not in same direction as actual view. Actual view indicated enemy ship moving away when map view indicates heading toward each other. Could be a fun and interesting game if it were more accurate and could actually progress in missions and save for later play. I WANT my money back!
I bought it want to play it but none of the start buttons work I cant even play it..enjoy my money I guess..

Worthless!!! Very few of the controls worked, could not save anything as 
button was frozen. Only way to get out of the game was to shut off my 
tablet.

Enjoy the simulation immensely.  Just two issues. Freezes every time I quit. Have to force quit from settings (Galaxy Tab A, mentioned previously). And... Can't elude depth charges when given plenty of time to slip away from last sighting while at depth.
A huge step forward for Android sub Sims, several bugs, but a noble first start.  Keep the updates coming!
Like for android tablets it's lagy plus it's a copy of silent hunter Please add naval mine fields please

For this game please add fathometer so we know accurate water depth. These subs also had sonar and radar so could these be added later? Also the loading a the end of a mission seems to have issues. I still can't earn medals at the end of a mission. Over all very nice game also can the anti air craft gun be made usable in the simulation? Can rescue missions for picking up downed air men be added?  Please

Fix bugs.  I destroyed an entire convoy but only 1 of the ships actually sank.  2 rolled over on their side 1 nose dived like the titanic and just bobbed up and down  Like a fishing bobber never sinking.  In real life the ship would have ripped in half like the titanic.  I want my money back!
Too many glitches, when i dive and try go to periscope its just a black screen, when i try to restart it freezes, this could be a great game but needs to be fixed
The game always freezes up after I play a mission.  So I can never attain any progress.  Fix this or refund me.

Being a developer myself since 1980 with a particular passion for subsims, this is a great attempt. For those that are moaning get a life, it needs folk to report the problems (not moaning) for the builder to fix them. Even harder with limited resources of Android. Remembering the years of bugs and crashes with Silent Hunter series, but the gameplay was unequivocal... Yes it has some bugs but then in 1942 so did the real subs... Haha,...  This is great program, a proper sim, not just an arcade and I am sure it will improve. So keep it up we are with you, and if I would ask for a quick fix it would be "Save & Exit". My Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 T580 just hangs on the exit screen.
Great game, really buggy, intermittent engagements with blank screens, sub sinks and crashes after restarting game... Not worth dealing with until these problems are fixed.
I love submarine games,  I just wished there was more of them about.I loved this game one of the best. Keep it up please, and please make more submarine war games.

Good game but not suitable for phones, to glitchy, jumpy, hit and miss controls with to much lag which sometimes freezes. I should amagine it's a great game if played on a tablet or laptop. I've played all the bigger games of Silent hunter on the pc, 1, 2 wolves of the Atlantic and 3 wolves of the Pacific, for the size of this game though it as close to these games as you'll get but not on a phone sadly.
Great updates guys.Love the free looking in the command room.Keep up the great stuff.

WANT MY DAMNED MONEY BACK!!!!!  Torpedoes don't load unless you have enough for all tubes!  Mid cruise the stupid games STOPS and you loose all progress!! A good idea and nice water effect....... but...... DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!

I like it but there are problems. Sometimes when attacking a convoy there will be ships that are not active and will not sink and does not count to your tonage. Also some of the torpedoes do not reload. Please fix this. Also add aircraft and port raids. Missions would be nice to. Also it shows you can get medals but you can not get them awarded to you. Please fix these issues. Thank you
Do not like this game, how do I get a refund

I sincerely hope that this game will be updated with better functionality- and gameplay. It has the potential to evolve from a fun pastime game to a truly immersive, long lasting gaming experience, which is very difficult to find. Keep up the good work, look forward to see more.
Super games

My favorite subsim,would be neat if the interior was interactive to control the boat and we need some kind of underwater obstacles and littoral waters to explore. It's awfully empty down there then maby an upgrade system of some sort for sonar and reload times and such.

I like it so much. Way better then Crash Dive. But I rated it 4 stars because can you add more enemy's and actually and land for them? Also a cool secret is that if you dive at your port, there's a sunken ship!

It's 9 in the morning. You make contact with a large group: a carrier, two destroyers, a battleship, and three cruisers escorting a couple frieghters. You get close enough to launch torpedos. The frieghters and two cruisers peel off, fine this is war I'm going for war machines. All of a sudden things go wrong! You were too far away and your torpedos don't hit. They know where you are now. They corner you and begin launching depth charges! "Bring her down to a depth of 450! Dammit I know it's below test range!" You narrowly avoided the charges but your out of torpedos after you used the last of them to bring down the carrier. It's now a game of cat and mouse. "Take her to the surface, we'll use the deck gun" One after another you sink the enemy ships while hot lead rains down on your boat. It's now 6pm and it's calm now. Better take her back to Port for repairs. Ma and Pa will be proud.   10/10 would go one on five again.
I WANT MY MONEY BACK!
replyContent: Sure, please send me a mail, otherwise it's a bit difficult for us how to reach you. ;)

content: Not happy you did away with saving the game without going back to midway Also it would be nice if we could enter ports to sink ships
Wow new update on the game

**Update ** Wow, this game keeps getting better! Awesome! "I can't see the 3d crew on my Pixel XL, actually I'm not sure where they are supposed to be.** This is an excellent subsim in the lineage of Silent Service. This is a simulator, it's tough. I hope they continue to update and improve. I wish there was a way to give audio orders like "go to periscope depth" or "dive to such depth" like a quick menu or something.

Unable to play.  Perhaps the problem is with my telephone, but I haven't encountered it with any other program. I can't play the game because whenever I open a menu, such as "settings" or "new game," I cannot close it and return to the game. The "close" button changes color as though I pressed it, but the menu stays open. This is a shame, as this seems like it would be an excellent game, if only it worked...

I agree with Andrew South, the graphics on this game are much to be desired and it is a poor man's Silent Hunter, a very poor man's Silent Hunter. I play Atlantic Fleet and love the graphics on that. Tweak it a little (okay, a lot), make an easy firing solution, which you don't have now, make it so it's possible to fire torpedoes under water without the periscope, and please make the graphics are lot more realistic. Your graphics quite frankly, suck.
Having played Silent Service hour after hour for years,  I give this game an "A" for effort. Great play ability and views. Worth the price....  sure why not?
No land masses. Can we have protected harbours etc to attack please?
Great concept, but hopes to see detailed islands and submarines.

At last an engaging and atmospheric sub sim on android that has decent graphics and real tactical depth(ahem).  Developers please continue to enhance the game going forward. I hope you can add a binocular view for use on the bridge in addition to the TDT and a more  detailed tutorial and defined campaign. Having said that the gameplay mechanics are easy to pick up and the game is eminently playable as is.
Excellent game spoilt by continual ' freezing ' of screens during play.
Great game. Needs more bug fixes but on the right course
After combat game will sometimes not restart sub in zoomed out view.  Must start over.
replyContent: That's odd. Sounds like some problems with saving/loading. We'll work on an update that will have this whole saving/loading approach refactored.

content: This is a good game.Once you know what your doing it passes the time very nicely and stays interesting,and Im still in EASY mode so plenty more fun to come ! Great value for money.  Well done developers,recommended.
Best out there at the moment
Love this game

Good graphics and sounds. Varied target ships to attack. Looking forward to the possibility of aircraft and using an anti aircraft gun. A fun tactic I use is to disable an enemy ship with torpedoes then surface and finish it off with the deck gun. Issues I've experienced are last few torpedoes don't reload forcing a premature return to base to reload. And torpedoes that seem to miss the target on the map view but then suddenly hit the target.

The idea behind the game is good but it is a poor man's silent hunter. Plus when you compare the graphics with Atlantic Fleet, they are a poor relation. Atlantic held and still holds my attention a few months on. This games novelty hold was a week. Not worth the price of the game.  Get Atlantic fleet, it's more realistic and fun.
Really cool for a phone game. Reminds me of silent hunter.
Initial impression: Wow!
Fantastic for fans of SH series

Would love a strategy guide as the game doesn't hold your hand.  It seems like you really need to understand WW2 sub tactics to get the most out of this one...There's a manual, but it doesn't hold your hand either, which to me is a lot of the appeal.  Well worth the money to me, very fun.
I has not seen game like this...nice simulation
It's hard to find a good simulation off the desktop and this is one of them, well worth the investment.

I've been following the progress of this for months and the wait has been worth it. This is a brilliant sub sim and isn't a simple arcade game. It's clear the devs have been passionate about this and it shows. I'm happy to pay £6 for this as it's excellent work and no ads or iap. This is how gaming should be. There are some very minor tweaks that need sorting and the devs have said they're addressing them but it's nothing to ruin the gameplay. This is the best thing on my phone. Buy this and support it.
